system: Nuance DAX Copilot embedded in Epic

pipeline_assumed: FHIR Security & Privacy baseline: TLS, auth, access control, audit.
HIPAA/GDPR baseline for PHI/PII: encryption at rest/in transit, least privilege, audit.
Live clinical contexts require event/stream boundaries for freshness.
Hybrid deployment when cloud AI integrates with on-prem EHR/core.
Microservices for isolation, scaling, and per-service access boundaries.
Finance AI: end-to-end encryption, strict access, immutable audit; event-driven with some batch.
